Uses of Package
org.microbean.reference

  • Classes in org.microbean.reference used by org.microbean.reference
    Class
    Description
    AbstractClientProxier
    A skeletal implementation of the ClientProxier interface.
    ClientProxier
    A supplier of ClientProxy instances.
    ClientProxy
    An interface whose implementations pretend to be another type and alter the behavior of instances of that type in some way.
    DefaultRequest
    A basic implementation of the Request interface.
    InstanceRemover
    A facility for removing contextual instances from some kind of storage.
    Instances
    A factory for Suppliers of contextual instances.
    ProxySpecification
    Information about a client proxy.
    ReferenceException
    A RuntimeException thrown to indicate a problem with references.
